## ComponentsSpecBuilder.withHeader() method

Define a component header.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withHeader(name: string, header: HeaderObject | ReferenceObject): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | The name of the header |
|  header | <code>HeaderObject &#124; ReferenceObject</code> | Specification of the header |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
